examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, I paid for a subscription completely by accident. I did not realize a payment was going through, there was no warning and I did not mean to purchase a subscription. Is there any way I could please get a refund? 
Thank you in advance! 
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to activate the subscription, I wanted to see if there was a way to extend the trial and when I exit out of the window it automatically upgraded my account. I did not authorized this. Please submit refund on my account as soon as possible.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to renew - please cancel subscription and refund my card. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to sign up for a full year and would like to cancel the subscription. Thank you in advance for your help!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to subscribe and i don't want to. I don't have money at the moment.Thanks please refund it

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have not even used or logged into canva in months i don’t know how i got signed up for an annual subscription but I did not mean to. Please cancel this. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I did not mean to make this subscription. This trial was used for my daughter, but she did not inform me when the subscription would renew. I would appreciate a refund and cancellation please. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello,
I didn’t mean to continue this subscription!
Seeing as it was just charged today is there anyway of getting refund?
Or just being charge for this month and then canceled and refund the rest?
If you can help out would be great appreciated!
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I didn't mean for my canva account subscription to renew. Would I please be able to get a refund on my recent renewal? Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please cancel this subscription.  I did not realize my trial period was over and did it mean to continue it. 
Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please cancel this subscription.  I did not realize my trial period was over and did it mean to continue it. 
Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't confirm my subscription and I  thought this would mean no automatic renewal. I don't use Canva and a refund would be very much appreciated. I canceled my subscription as soon as I realised.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please refund all funds from each transaction and close my account. It was completely useless and I couldn’t even use it the first time. I could not find any means to cancel my subscription on here

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Did NOT mean to subscribe at this time. Can not afford it. PLEASE refund immediately.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to renew subscription. I thought I had already cancelled it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: hello, i accidentally upgraded to a canva pro subscription but I didn't mean too and would like to cancel and  be refunded.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't mean to continue the subscription. I can't afford the charge. Please send me a refund. Thanks,

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't mean to sign up for the subscription and haven't used Canva, please can you cancel the subscription and send a refund

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi! I did not mean to have my subscription renewed, but didn't cancel the free trial in time. I just tried to cancel my pro subscription but it said it wouldn't cancel until 2022. Is there a way to cancel it early and receive a refund please? Thanks!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello I would like to request a refund I did not mean to sign up for canva pro and I don’t use it. I was charged today

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to subscribe to premium and would like to cancel and have a full refund

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Did not mean to subscribe. Please issue refund. Thx

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I wasn't mean to renew this subscription. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi! I did not mean to sign up for canva Pro- can I request a refund? I did not realize it charged me

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford this, didn't mean to sign up to canva premium. if this is any way I can get a refund I would appreciate that

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: We did not mean to renew this subscription. Please cancel the subscription and provide a refund. Thank you so much.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to subscribe to the year long subscription. I do not want to be charge for this.
Invoice #: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The subscription was automatically renewed and I did not have the means to cancel it early. I will not use the service, nor was it used as of January 15.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am requesting a refund. I did not mean to purchase the subscription. I mean to cancel the free trial and I was charged. 
Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to keep this account and used the wrong login information. Please help reconcile these issues so I can get a refund. I have cancelled my subscription. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please issue the refund. I did not mean to subscribe. Thx

Refund request reason: Hello,
I am a teacher and I did not mean to sign up for a subscription, can you please refund this charge?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi guys, I believe I request a free trial, and then all of a sudden i had this charge showing on my credit card. I did not mean to subscribe. So yeah, could you please refund me. thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, I paid for a subscription completely by accident. I did not realize a payment was being processed as there was no notice or warning. I did not mean to purchase a subscription and I am wondering if I could please get a refund.
Thank you in advance. 
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i did not mean to sign up for a subscription and have cancelled my account. i am requesting a refund for invoice number <NUMBER>and <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i can not afford this i absolutely did not mean to get it!

Refund request reason: Hi, 
I did not mean to subscribe again for another year. Can you please process a refund?


Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I canceled immediately because I did not mean to sign up for this. I do not even know how to get back there and it hasn’t been used since that first day when I was just playing around.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I only used this one time and didn't mean to leave it active. Didn't realize until I got the notification from PayPal that I was billed today. I can't afford it and already canceled. Please refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't mean to resubscribe - please refund and cancel subscription

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to buy the subscription. I was on the trail and I forgot to unsubscribe. Could you please cancel and refund? 

Thank you.
Regards
Anita Liza Logaraj
+<NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to renew canva pro

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, I had an automatic renewal of the free month when I didn't want it immediately. I occasionally needed canva pro and with <NAME> and the covid, I didn't have the immediate financial means to pay such an amount. Thank you kindly refund me as soon as possible. Sincerely, <NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't mean to sign up for Canva Pro...I was looking to try it free for a month first.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, i did not mean to sign up for the paid version. Please process a refund before i request one with my bank. Please cancel the subscription.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi Could I please get a refund on this charge - I did not mean to go ahead with this subscription. Many thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to subscribe. It just got click. Please issue the refund. thx

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please can you cancel my request, as I went to end the subscription payment had just been taken. I do not with you have membership this month. I have not the funds to do this. Please may I get a refund. I have made a small purchase within my means. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to sign up for a monthly subscription. I do not want a canva pro account.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Did not mean to start a canva pro subscription

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to cancel my subscription, did not mean to renew

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Account associated with former workplace. I did not mean to renew my subscription. Please process a refund and I will cancel subscription. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Did not mean to start this subscription

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I did not mean to continue my subscription beyond today. I thought I had until the end of today to cancel. I apologize for any inconvenience.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Reason for the reimbursement request: Hello, I would like to be reimbursed because the subscription request was made without my knowledge (I do not know who it is). I am a student and the amount of the subscription is beyond my means. Please can you refund me.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel the subscription as I was busy with other life commitments. It would mean a lot to <NAME> if I can have this refunded.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I accidentally authorized this & did not mean to. I have no use for it at this time.

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: Hello, I have been meaning to cancel my subscription but I was charged earlier today. Would it be possible to request for a refund? Even if it means losing access for the next billing period. Thank you
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I didn't mean to subscribe.Please I just want my 12.95US back.Thank You.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t mean to charge this much i wanted to do something else can we take the charge off please and refund my money.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I accidentally bought something and I didn't mean to. Can I please have a refund?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t mean to be charged, I forgot to cancel my trial. I was not satisfied.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to purchase the plan and it has caused me to be in over draft, I just wanted to be refunded for that error as I am currently unemployed

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not mean to sign up for premium and haven’t used the features

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I do not want canva pro. Please cancel I didnot mean to purcahse and I do not want it

How can we help you ?: Good afternoon. By this means I request a refund of a payment that they made with my PayPal for $ 119.40 since it is not authorized by me and it was automatic. The payment format ID is <NUMBER>and the transaction ID is <NUMBER>MK<NUMBER>. I have the receipt where the money was deducted but I cannot send it by this means. I appreciate that they make me the refund. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did not mean to sign up as I never use this and I cannot figure out how to cancel.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I mean to cancel this. I don't want pro, sorry.
